definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: The two dueled, transforming the office of politics into an arena of lightsaber combat.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆展開決鬥，把政府辦公室變成光劍格鬥場。

sentences.english: Descent: Freespace is a new chapter in space dogfight sims.
sentences.chinese: 《縱橫太空》開創了太空格鬥模擬遊戲的新篇章。

sentences.english: In the training system of skill-oriented fighting events, research of sportsmans physical optimal is now increasingly being concerned.
sentences.chinese: 技能主導型格鬥類項羣是我國競技運動的優勢項目。

sentences.english: He is an expert in unarmed combat.
Wresting is a form of empty-hand combat.
sentences.chinese: 摔跤是一項徒手進行的格鬥運動。

sentences.english: The villagers drove the invaders away in a fight flashing with knives and swords.
sentences.chinese: 在一場刀光劍影的格鬥中，村民們把侵略者趕跑了。

sentences.english: Seeing them fighting, it looks like a mad combative game.
sentences.chinese: 看它們的戰鬥，就像一場瘋狂的格鬥遊戲。

sentences.english: Some run up mountains of sand with another fighter on their backs.
sentences.chinese: 某些格鬥士會背著另一位格鬥士往沙丘上跑。

sentences.english: Some run up mountains of sand with another fighter on their backs.
sentences.chinese: 某些格鬥士會背著另一位格鬥士往沙丘上跑。

sentences.english: The trimmings are soon forgotten in a hand-to-hand encounter for life or death.
sentences.chinese: 在徒手生死格鬥中，細枝末節很快就會被忘掉。

sentences.english: Fred had no intention of engaging in ship-to-ship combat.
sentences.chinese: 弗雷德沒有興趣進行一場艦對艦格鬥。

sentences.english: For I have never met my match in joust or duel.
sentences.chinese: 無論是馬上格鬥還是步行格鬥，我都沒有遇到過對手。

sentences.english: For I have never met my match in joust or duel.
sentences.chinese: 無論是馬上格鬥還是步行格鬥，我都沒有遇到過對手。

sentences.english: It is also the site of a large Gladiator graveyard.
sentences.chinese: 這裏也有一大片格鬥者的墓地。

definition: to spar/to fight/to duke it out
variant of 策劃|策划[ce4 hua4]
to fight, esp. with hands/wrestling (as a sport)/to wrestle/to wrestle (against fate, with a problem etc)/to capture prey
to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
